Verses: 1 saamuvel Maranamataindhaan. Isravelar Ellaarum Kootivandhu, Avanukkaakath Thukkangontaati, Raamaavilirukkira Avanutaiya Valavile Avanai Atakkampanninaarkal; Thaaveedhu Ezhundhu, Paaraan Vanaandharaththirkup Purappattup Ponaan.

2 maakonile Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avanutaiya Thozhildhurai Karmelil Irundhadhu; Andha Manushan Makaa Paarik Kutiththanakkaaranaayirundhaan; Avanukku Moovaayiram Aatum, Aayiram Vellaatum Irundhadhu; Avan Appozhudhu Karmelil Than Aatukalai Mayir Kaththariththukkontirundhaan.

3 andha Manushanukku Naapaal Endrum, Avan Manaivikku Apikaayil Endrum Peyar; Andha Sdhiree Makaa Puththisaaliyum Roopavadhiyumaayirundhaal; Andhap Purushano Muratanum Thuraakirudhanumaayirundhaan; Avan Kaaleputaiya Sandhadhiyaan.
4 naapaal Than Aatukalai Mayirkaththarikkira Seydhiyai Vanaandharaththil Irukkira Thaaveedhu Kettapodhu,
5 thaaveedhu Paththu Vaaliparai Azhaiththu: Neengal Karmelukkup Poi, Naapaalitaththil Sendru, En Peraichcholli, Avan Sukaseydhiyai Visaariththu,
6 avanai Nokki: Neer Vaazhka, Umakkuch Chamaadhaanamum, Ummutaiya Veettukkuch Chamaadhaanamum, Umakku Untaana Ellaavatrirkum Samaadhaanamum Untaavadhaaka Endru Avanai Vaazhththi,

7 ippozhudhu Aatukalai Mayirkaththarikkiravarkal Ummitaththil Irukkiraarkal Endru Kelvippatten; Ummutaiya Meyppar Engalotekoota Irundhaarkal; Avarkal Karmelil Irundha Naalellaam Naangal Avarkalai Varuththappatuththavillai; Avarkalutaiya Porul Ondrum Kaanaamarponadhum Illai.

8 ummutaiya Velaikkaararaik Kelum; Avarkal Umakkuch Cholluvaarkal; Aadhalaal Indha Vaaliparukku Ummutaiya Kankalile Thayaikitaikkaventum; Nalla Naalil Vandhom; Ummutaiya Kaikku Udhavuvadhai Ummutaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkum, Ummutaiya Kumaaranaakiya Thaaveedhukkum Kotukkumpati Ventukiren Endru Sollungal Endraan.
9 thaaveedhin Vaalipar Poi, Indha Vaarththaikalaiyellaam Thaaveedhin Naamaththinaale Naapaalitaththil Solli, Pinnondrum Pesaadhirundhaarkal.
10 naapaal Thaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaararukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Thaaveedhu Enpavan Yaar? Eesaayin Kumaaran Yaar? Thangal Ejamaankalai Vittu Otippokira Velaikkaarar Innaalil Anekar Untu.

11 naan En Appaththaiyum, En Thanneeraiyum, En Aatukalai Mayirkaththarikkiravarkalukkaaka Naan Atiththuch Chamaiyal Pannuviththadhaiyum Etuththu, Inna Itaththaar Endru Naan Ariyaadha Manusharukkuk Kotuppeno Endraan.
12 thaaveedhin Vaalipar Thangal Vazhiye Thirumpi, Marupatiyum Thaaveedhinitaththil Vandhu, Indha Vaarththaikalaiyellaam Avanukku Ariviththaarkal.

13 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Than Manusharaip Paarththu: Neengal Avaravar Ungal Pattayaththaik Kattikkollungal Endraan; Avaravar Thangal Pattayaththaik Kattikkontaarkal; Thaaveedhum Than Pattayaththaik Kattikkontaan; Erakkuraiya Naanooruper Thaaveedhukkup Pin Sendru Purappattupponaarkal; Irunooruper Rasdhukkal Antaiyil Irundhuvittaarkal.

14 appozhudhu Velaikkaararil Oruvan Naapaalutaiya Manaiviyaakiya Apikaayilai Nokki: Idho, Nammutaiya Ejamaanutaiya Sukaseydhi Visaarikka Thaaveedhu Vanaandharaththilirundhu Aatkalai Anuppinaan; Avarkal Peril Avar Seerinaar.

15 andha Manusharo Engalukku Mikavum Upakaarikalaayirundhaarkal; Naangal Velikalil Irukkumpodhu, Avarkal Engalitaththil Natamaatina Naalellaam Avarkal Engalai Varuththappatuththinadhumillai; Namadhu Porulil Ondrum Kaanaamarponadhumillai.
16 naangal Aatukalai Meyththu, Avarkalitaththil Irundha Naalellaam Avarkal Iravumpakalum Engalaich Chutrilum Madhilaayirundhaarkal.

17 ippodhum Neer Seyyaventiyadhaik Kavaniththuppaarum; Nammutaiya Ejamaanmelum, Avarutaiya Veettaar Yaavarmelum, Nichchayamaai Oru Pollaappu Varukiradhaayirukkiradhu; Ivaro, Oruvarum Thammote Pesak Kootaadhapatikku, Peliyaalin Makanaayirukkiraar Endraan.

18 appozhudhu Apikaayil Theeviramaai Irunooru Appangalaiyum, Irantu Thuruththi Thiraatcharasaththaiyum, Samaiyal Pannappatta Aindhu Aatukalaiyum, Aindhu Pati Varuththa Payatraiyum, Vatralaakkappatta Nooru Thiraatchakkulaikalaiyum, Vatralaana Irunooru Aththippazha Ataikalaiyum Etuththu, Kazhudhaikalmel Etri,
19 than Velaikkaararaip Paarththu: Neengal Enakku Munne Pongal; Idho, Naan Ungal Pinne Varukiren Endru Solli Anuppinaal; Than Purushanaakiya Naapaalukku Adhai Arivikkavillai.
20 aval Oru Kazhudhaiyinmel Eri, Malaiyin Maraivil Irangivarukaiyil, Idho, Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Avalukku Edhiraaka Irangivandhaarkal; Avarkalaich Chandhiththaal.

21 thaaveedhu Than Janangalai Nokki: Avanukku Vanaandharaththil Irukkiradhaiyellaam Veenaakave Kaappaatrinen; Avanukku Untaanadhilellaam Ondrum Kaanaamarponadhillai; Endraalum Nanmaikkup Padhilaaka Avan Enakkuth Theemaiseydhaan.

22 avanukku Untaana Ellaavatrilum Suvaril Neervitum Oru Naayaimudhalaai Pozhudhuvitiyumattum Naan Uyirote Vaiththaal, Thevan Thaaveedhin Saththurukkalukku Adharkuch Chariyaakavum Adharku Adhikamaakavum Seyyakkatavar Endru Solliyirundhaan.
23 apikaayil Thaaveedhaik Kaankaiyil, Theeviramaaik Kazhudhaiyai Vittu Irangi, Thaaveedhukku Neraakath Tharaiyil Mukanguppura Vizhundhu Panindhu,
24 avan Paadhaththile Vizhundhu: En Aantavane, Indhap Paadhakam Enmel Sumarattum; Ummutaiya Atiyaalutaiya Vaarththaikalai Neer Ketkumporuttaaka Ummutaiya Atiyaal Umadhu Seviketkap Pesaventum.

25 en Aantavanaakiya Neer Naapaal Ennum Indhap Peliyaalin Manushanai Oru Poruttaaka Ennaventaam; Avan Peyar Eppatiyo Appatiye Avanum Irukkiraan; Avan Peyar Naapaal, Avanukkup Payiththiyamum Irukkiradhu; Ummutaiya Atiyaalaakiya Naano, En Aantavan Anuppina Vaaliparaik Kaanavillai.

26 ippodhum En Aantavane, Neer Iraththam Sindha Varavum, Ummutaiya Kai Needhiyaich Charikkattavum, Karththar Umakku Itangotukkavillai Enpadhaikkarththarutaiya Jeevanaikkontum, Ummutaiya Jeevanaikkontum Sollukiren; Ippodhum Ummutaiya Saththurukkalum, En Aantavanukku Virodhamaakap Pollaapputh Thetukiravarkalum, Naapaalaippola Aakakkatavarkal.
27 ippodhum Umadhu Atiyaal En Aantavanukkuk Kontuvandha Kaanikkaiyai Etrukkontu, En Aantavanaip Pinpatrukira Vaaliparukkuk Kotuppeeraaka.

28 umadhu Atiyaalin Paadhakaththai Manniyum, Karththar En Aantavanukku Nilaiyaana Veettai Nichchayamaaik Kattuvaar; En Aantavan Karththarutaiya Yuththangalai Nataththukiravaraame; Neer Uyirote Irukkum Naalil Oru Pollaappum Ummile Kaanappataadhiruppadhaaka.

29 ummaith Thunpappatuththavum, Ummutaiya Piraananai Vaanga Vakaidhetavum, Oru Manushan Ezhumpinaalum En Aantavanutaiya Aaththumaa Ummutaiya Thevanaakiya Karththarin Aadharavil Irukkira Jeevanullorutaiya Kattile Kattappattirukkum; Ummutaiya Saththurukkalin Aaththumaakkalo Kavanil Vaiththu Erindhaarpola Eriyappattuppom.
30 karththar Ummaik Kuriththuch Chonna Nanmaiyinpati Ellaam Ini En Aantavanukkuch Cheydhu, Isravelukku Adhipadhiyaaka Ummai Nemikkum Podhu,

31 neer Virudhaavaai Iraththam Sindhaamalum, En Aantavanaakiya Neer Pazhivaangaamalum Irundhadhuntaanaal, Appozhudhu En Aantavanaakiya Umakkuth Thukkamum Iraadhu, Mana Itaralum Iraadhu; Karththar En Aantavanukku Nanmai Seyyumpodhu, Ummutaiya Atiyaalai Ninaippeeraaka Endraal.
32 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Apikaayilai Nokki: Unnai Indraiyadhinam Ennaich Chandhikka Anuppina Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththarukku Sdhoththiram.

33 nee Solliya Yosanai Aaseervadhikkappatuvadhaaka; Naan Iraththam Sindha Varaadhapatikkum, En Kaiye Pazhivaangaadhapatikkum, Nee Indraiyadhinam Enakkuth Thataipanninapatiyinaal, Neeyum Aaseervadhikkappatuvaayaaka.

34 nee Theeviramaai Ennaich Chandhikka Varaamal Irundhaayaanaal, Pozhudhu Vitiyumattum Naapaalukku Oru Naayum Uyirote Vaikkappatuvadhillai Endru, Unakkup Pollaappuch Cheyya Enakku Itangotaadhirukkira Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththarin Jeevanaikkontu Meyyaaich Chollukiren Endru Solli,

35 aval Thanakkuk Kontuvandhadhaith Thaaveedhu Aval Kaiyile Vaangi Kontu, Avalaip Paarththu: Nee Samaadhaanaththote Un Veettukkup Po; Idho, Naan Un Sollaikkettu, Un Mukaththaip Paarththu, Ippatich Cheydhen Endraan.

36 apikaayil Naapaalitaththil Vandhapodhu, Idho, Raajavirundhukku Oppaana Virundhu Avan Veettile Natandhadhu; Avan Irudhayam Kaliththirundhadhu; Avan Mikavum Veriththumirundhaan; Aakaiyaal Pozhudhu Vitiyumattum Siriyakaariyamaanaalum Periya Kaariyamaanaalum, Ondraiyum Avanukku Arivikkavillai.
37 pozhudhu Vitindhu, Naapaalin Veridhelindhapinpu, Avan Manaivi Indha Varththamaanangalai Avanukku Ariviththaal; Appozhudhu Avan Irudhayam Avanukkulle Seththu, Avan Kallaippolaanaan.
38 karththar Naapaalai Vaadhiththadhinaal, Erakkuraiyap Paththunaalukkuppinpu, Avan Seththaan.

39 naapaal Seththupponaan Endru Thaaveedhu Kelvippattapodhu: En Nindhaiyin Vazhakkai Naapaalin Kaiyil Visaariththu, Thammutaiya Atiyaanaip Pollaappuch Cheyyaadhapatikkuth Thatuththa Karththarukku Sdhoththiram; Karththar Thaame Naapaalin Pollaappai Avan Thalaiyinmel Thirumpappanninaar Endru Solli, Apikaayilai Vivaakampannukiradharkaaka Avalote Pesa, Thaaveedhu Aatkalai Anuppinaan.
40 thaaveedhin Oozhiyakkaarar Karmelil Irukkira Apikaayilantaikku Vandhu, Thaaveedhu Unnai Vivaakampanna Manadhaai, Engalai Unnitaththil Anuppinaar Endru Avalote Sollukirapodhu,
41 aval Ezhundhirundhu, Tharaimattum Mukangunindhu, Idho, Naan En Aantavanutaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Kaalkalaik Kazhuvaththakka Panivitaikkaariyaakiya Avarutaiya Atiyaal Endraal.
42 pinpu Apikaayil Theeviriththu Ezhundhu, Oru Kazhudhaiyinmel Eri, Aindhu Thaadhippenkalaik Koottik Kontu, Thaaveedhin Sdhaanaapadhikalukkup Pinsendru Poi, Avanukku Manaiviyaanaal.
43 yesrayel Ooraalaakiya Akinovaamaiyum Thaaveedhu Vivaakampanninaan; Avarkal Iruvarum Avanukku Manaiviyaanaarkal.
44 savul: Thaaveedhin Manaiviyaakiya Meekaal Ennum Than Kumaaraththiyaik Kaaleem Ooraanaakiya Laayeesin Kumaaranaana Palththikkuk Kotuththirundhaan.
